about.title: About Us
about.description: I am Freydoun Aghebati, a frontend developer focused on designing modern, fast, and fully localized user interfaces for Persian-speaking audiences. I am passionate about creating experiences that are both technically flawless and culturally trustworthy. Using tools such as React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, I strive to build interfaces that are beautiful, fast, and intuitive for Iranian users. My goal is to align technology with our language and culture, because I believe good design is not only about appearance—it’s about truly understanding the audience.
